attributes.action: get rid of the many corrupt police working in the forces who cause so much chaos and misery due to their incompetence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: So many cases appear in our media and in our courts on a daily basis hilighting the ineptitudes of the police force aho have no lost so much respect and are a bad influence on the young. The corruption in the force is right and a clean-up is desperately required.

rejection.details: Your petition contains claims that are unsubstantiated.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
